info.name: Nobel Design
info.longDescription: Offering a bar, Nobel Design Hotel is located in the heart of Belgrade, 600 metres from Republic Square Belgrade. Private parking can be arranged at an additional cost. The property offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfer, concierge service and free WiFi throughout the property. Rooms at Nobel Design Hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, cable TV (flat-screen), a safe and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Certain units at Nobel Design Hotel have a balcony, while a kettle is included in the rooms. Bed linen and towels are available in all rooms at Nobel Design Hotel. Breakfast options include buffet, continental or gluten-free. Popular points of interest near Nobel Design Hotel include St. Sava Cathedral, National Assembly of The Republic of Serbia and Ta≈°majdan Stadium. Belgrade Nikola Tesla Airport is 14 km away.
